thread.section_title: Gwen Stefani News on Partner Blake Shelton, Kids and More | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: goes to church in a glossy red outfit
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani goes to church in a glossy red outfit | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Machado For Dailymail.com
title: goes to church in a glossy red outfit
text:
She's never knowingly underdressed.
And Gwen Stefani put on quite the fashion show as she headed to church with her three children on Sunday.
The pop superstar was spotted in Los Angeles heading towards the chapel as she walked with her sons inside.
Carrying her youngest son Apollo, two, in her arms, the 47-year-old's older kids Kingston, 10, and Zuma, eight, walked next to her.
Scroll down for video
Church goers: Gwen Stefani was seen in Los Angeles on Sunday heading to a chapel with her kids Kingston, Zuma and Apollo
Gwen wore a red and black coat with co-ordinating trousers.
Keeping her hair tied back, the singer appeared to be in a good mood as she smiled on her way inside.
What an outfit! The singer wore red and black attire that made her shine on the sidewalk
The three boys dressed appropriately for church with clean button-up shirts.
Apollo seemed pretty sleepy as his mom carried him. Kingston had his hair combed to the side and looked to be in a solemn mood.
Zuma wore a grey long-sleeve shirt with glasses as he strolled with his family.
Dress to impress: Gwen's sons keep it fashionable for their day together as a girl in pink joins in
The family attended the Sunday morning session with their grandfather Dennis Stefani who carried Apollo at one point.
The members also had a young blonde girl with them who looked fancy in pink attire.
Gwen's boyfriend Blake Shelton was nowhere to be seen as he could've been at home getting ready for Super Bowl Sunday.
So much red: The Hollaback Girl singer showed off her shade along with her black heels
Always a superstar: No matter where she goes, the No Doubt leader knows how to dress
After church, Gwen headed back to her car where her look was enough to cause plenty of heads to turn.
Even though she had a casual day out, the icon made sure to stay in touch with her sparkle glam side.
The shade of her red outfit could be seen in the reflection of her car as more photos were taken of her.
Flashy flashy: Photographers got some new snaps of the mother of three as she headed home
Fun morning: The girlfriend of Blake Shelton was all smiles as she left church to spend the rest of the day with her family
Gwen was married to Gavin Rossdale from 2002-2016. She started dating Blake in October 2015.
Her beau won a People's Choice Award this year for Favorite Album and Favorite Male Country Artist where he thanked the No Doubt singer during his speech.
'Got a lot of people to thank,' the country star said. 'Thank the hottest date here tonight, Gwen Stefani, who's sitting right there!'
Going strong: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton have been dating since 2015. Here they are at the People's Choice Awards last month
